com.facebook.litho

Interface WorkContinuationInstrumenter.Instrumenter

  • Enclosing class:
    WorkContinuationInstrumenter

    public static interface WorkContinuationInstrumenter.Instrumenter
    Allows to record work being continued across threads.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isTracing()
      Allows to know in advance if the custom instrumenter desires to receive continuation updates.
      void markFailure(java.lang.Object token, java.lang.Throwable th)
      Reports a failure while executing work.
      java.lang.Object onAskForWorkToContinue(java.lang.String tag)
      Captures when asking for work to be stolen.
      java.lang.Object onBeginWorkContinuation(java.lang.String tag, java.lang.Object token)
      Captures the beginning of the continuation for stolen work.
      void onEndWorkContinuation(java.lang.Object token)
      Captures the end of the continuation for stolen work.
      java.lang.Object onOfferWorkForContinuation(java.lang.String tag)
      Tracks when some work is ready to offered for continuation.
      java.lang.Object onOfferWorkForContinuation(java.lang.String tag, java.lang.Object token)
      Tracks when some work is ready to be stolen.

    • Method Detail

      • isTracing

        boolean isTracing()
        Allows to know in advance if the custom instrumenter desires to receive continuation updates.
        Returns:
        true to specify interest in handling the updates, false otherwise.

      • onAskForWorkToContinue

        java.lang.Object onAskForWorkToContinue(java.lang.String tag)
        Captures when asking for work to be stolen.
        Parameters:
        tag - name.
        Returns:
        a token object that allows to track the continuation.

      • onOfferWorkForContinuation

        java.lang.Object onOfferWorkForContinuation(java.lang.String tag)
        Tracks when some work is ready to offered for continuation.
        Parameters:
        tag - name.
        Returns:
        a token object that allows to track the continuation.

      • onOfferWorkForContinuation

        java.lang.Object onOfferWorkForContinuation(java.lang.String tag,
                                            java.lang.Object token)
        Tracks when some work is ready to be stolen.
        Parameters:
        tag - name (optional).
        token - returned by onAskForWorkToContinue(java.lang.String).
        Returns:
        a token object that allows to track the continuation.

      • onBeginWorkContinuation

        java.lang.Object onBeginWorkContinuation(java.lang.String tag,
                                         java.lang.Object token)
        Captures the beginning of the continuation for stolen work.
        Parameters:
        tag - name (optional).
        token - returned by onOfferWorkForContinuation(java.lang.String).
        Returns:
        a token object that allows to track the continuation.

      • onEndWorkContinuation

        void onEndWorkContinuation(java.lang.Object token)
        Captures the end of the continuation for stolen work.
        Parameters:
        token - returned by onBeginWorkContinuation(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object).

      • markFailure

        void markFailure(java.lang.Object token,
                 java.lang.Throwable th)
        Reports a failure while executing work.

        onEndWorkContinuation(Object) (Object)} still needs to be invoked.

        Parameters:
        token - returned by onBeginWorkContinuation(String, Object) (Object, String)}.
        th - containing the failure.
